definition: fig. unmarried person/single person (especially one who is comfortable financially)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Or just lots of other wild singles.
sentences.chinese: 或者只是更多其他狂野的单身贵族？

sentences.english: Neither my brother nor his friends are independently wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 我哥和他的朋友都不再是单身贵族了。

definition: (Internet slang) person who is neither married nor in a relationship (used self-deprecatingly)
"leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
(Internet slang) person who is neither married nor in a relationship (used self-deprecatingly)
young people in their late 20s or older who are still unmarried
older (than average in a group, at school, for marriage etc)
lit. moonlight group/fig. those who spend their monthly income even before they earn their next salary (slang)
(coll.) adults still living with and depending on their parents
